main event: An unidentified flying object was observed flickering and disappearing in the sky, resembling a Roman candle just before explosion.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object traveled northwest without a trail,The observer was a trained military reserve sergeant,The object made no sound and disappeared silently,Conditions at the time were clear to scattered clouds.
sighted object: one flickering object resembling a Roman candle
witness description: A trained military reserve sergeant in the Army, age 36, male.
